song_lyrics: Pāpaṇne bāraṇiye chhidra me, janma janmanī āṇ° ṭek
Jatan karī jāḷaviyu, te hiy ratan gayo Hari chorī;
Aharah jan Vraj ḍhūnḍhat, firat sukhmay nīndar chhoḍī;
Māl sahit khal kuṭil grahyo av kyam chhoḍu Vraj bhāṇ. 1
Eno mor mukuṭ shir māre muralī adhar dhāru;
Toḍī sūr na gāvu Horī, hinḍol mahi man māru;
Rahasi mahi rasmay tyahi Rādhā koṇ, koṇ vaḷī tyahi kān. 2
title: Hari māre nayaṇe bandīvān

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-895: unknown

Category: Prakirna Pad
